channel.title: Hugo on Khoa Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Khoa Pham

item.title: My First Hugo Theme
item.description: When I started to get back to blogging, I felt my website took a little long to compile. As a revolution of redesigning my blog, I want to switch my blog platform to something faster. My blog was previously developed using Middleman, and now it’s powered by Hugo, a faster static site generator. I’m really pleased with the transition so far. I also wrote a simple Hugo theme called Hugo Minimalist, this is just a mimic of my current blog style, which I explained in Minimalist in design.
